text:
Badhaai Ho is a hilarious take on Indian’s mentality on parent’s having sex. The film's trailer will tickle your funny bone, especially watching Ayushmaan Khurrana’s embarrassment after he learns that his mom played by Neena Gupta is pregnant. The trailer of the film definitely left us curious and now Neena’s daughter Masaba Gupta’s review on the film has made us even more eager.
Masaba wrote down a beautiful note about the film on her Instagram. She is in awe of her mom Neena ji’s performance. She even said that Neena Gupta's second innings is the best and she should stop complaining about why didn't she get meatier roles when she was younger.
Apart from applauding her mom Neena ji's performance, she called the film warmest, funniest and loveliest. Are you excited to watch Badhaai Ho? The film will hit the theatres on October 19, 2018.

title: Neena Gupta’s Daughter Masaba Is All Praises For 'Badhaai Ho', Writes A Heartwarming Post
description: Badhai Ho is a hilarious take on Indian’s mentality on parent’s sex. The film's trailer will tickle your bones on Ayushmaan Khurrana’s embarrassment after he learns that his mom played by Neena Gupta is pregnant. The trailer of the film made us restless to watch the film and now Neena’s daughter Masaba Gupta’s review on the film has made us even more eager.
